item.title: Stack Implementation in C
item.description: Typically stacks are like arrays, the difference is in a stack addition and deletion operations are performed from one end, this end is called top. Let’s have a look at stack terminology ###Top A pointer to top most item is called top of the stack, all operations are performed on top of the stack. ###Push Pushing a item into stack means inserting a new item to the top of stack.
